h1, m1 = map(int, input().split(':')) # разделяем ввод на часы и минуты
h2, m2 = map(int, input().split(':')) # разделяем ввод на часы и минуты

m3 = (m1 + m2) // 2 # средняя минута
h3 = h1 + (m1 + m2) // 120 # средний час

if h3 > 23: # если средний час больше 23, то отнимаем 24
    h3 -= 24 # отнимаем 24

print('{:02}:{:02}'.format(h3, m3))

import sys

def time_to_minutes(time):
    return time[0] * 60 + time[1]

def minutes_to_time(minutes):
    return [minutes // 60, minutes % 60]

def main():
    start_time = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split(':')]
    end_time = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split(':')]
    start_minutes = time_to_minutes(start_time)
    end_minutes = time_to_minutes(end_time)
    middle_minutes = (start_minutes + end_minutes) // 2
    middle_time = minutes_to_time(middle_minutes)
    print('{:02d}:{:02d}'.format(middle_time[0], middle_time[1]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()



import sys

def time_to_minutes(time):

    return time[0] * 60 + time[1]

def minutes_to_time(minutes):
    return [minutes // 60, minutes % 60]


def main():
    start_time = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split(':')]  # noqa
    end_time = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split(':')]  # noqa
    start_minutes = time_to_minutes(start_time)
    end_minutes = time_to_minutes(end_time)
    middle_minutes = (start_minutes + end_minutes) // 2
    middle_time = minutes_to_time(middle_minutes)
    print('{:02d}:{:02d}'.format(middle_time[0], middle_time[1]))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def time_to_minutes(time):
    return time[0] * 60 + time[1]

def minutes_to_time(minutes):
    return [minutes // 60, minutes % 60]

def main():
    start_time = [int(x) for x in input().split(':')]
    end_time = [int(x) for x in input().split(':')]
    start_minutes = time_to_minutes(start_time) 
    end_minutes = time_to_minutes(end_time) 
    middle_minutes = (start_minutes + end_minutes) // 2
    middle_time = minutes_to_time(middle_minutes)
    print('{:02d}:{:02d}'.format(middle_time[0], middle_time[1]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

h1, m1 = map(int, input().split(':'))
h2, m2 = map(int, input().split(':'))

m3 = (m1 + m2) // 2
h3 = h1 + (m1 + m2) // 120

if h3 > 23:
    h3 -= 24

print('{:02}:{:02}'.format(h3, m3))
